manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bravokids Toys for 3+ Years Old Girls Boys
Gifts for 3 4 5 6 7 8 Year Old Girls Boys
Multi-purpose Writing Board Previous page Next page

This would be a perfect idea-Gifting your kid a writing tablet!!! Drawing and coloring can be a messy business. No matter how careful you think your child is going to be, marker somehow ends up on the table, on some furniture or inexplicably, on your child’s skin or clothing. Our drawing board perfectly solves the above problems and reduces the maintenance of drawing time without affecting the creativity of children. bravokids drawing tablets for kids can be suitable for budding artists of all ages. Whether your child is just learning to hold a pencil, or is preparing to head off to study art at college, a drawing tablet can be a hugely beneficial part of their development. 10 inch Colorful Writing Tablet also offers convenience in the form of a one-click clear function to erase all the contents on the tablet in one click. The different variety of colors built into the tablet make it a good coloring/scribbling book alternative that will keep your child entertained forever. These tablets don’t ever get exhausted so you won’t have to worry about your kid running out of paper to draw and doodle. Not only suitable for home and office, but also suitable for children to play, create or study. Digital drawing and writing tablets are the way to go when it comes to keep your child engaged and entertained.

Erase Button Still using an eraser and throwing away paper? Clear button to solve your troubles! Say goodbye to traditional writing and drawing mode. Convenient Lock Key Effectively prevent accidental clearing, maintain smooth drawing and writing, don't worry about your works suddenly disappearing. Elastic tether and pen clip With the lanyard to attach, the pen won't lose anymore! Cool educational toys Doodle board has colorful screen, providing children with better painting experience, improving children's creative ability and imagination!

Travel toys for toddlers It’s durable and portable, this drawing tablet is designed with kids in mind Allow your kids to draw in colorful colors all the while not harming their eyes and containing their mess to the tablets. The tablets are so lightweight durable that children can enjoy the fun of painting, spelling and imitation anytime and anywhere, fully release imagination and creativity, improve their concentration, stay away from electronic products. Made of durable plastic, anti-fall and anti shock, easy for use in multiple occasion: airplane, car, restaurant, etc.

reviews.reviewerName: Easy to use, bright shimmery colors that add a pop to your alcohol ink masterpiece. I have asl used it to create a beautiful effect with acrylic paint.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought three of these for my grandkids. Well made, sturdy, plastic (easy wash), colorful writers. For hours of fun, I bought them to stick in the pocket of the car so they always have something to do. Easy to learn and create, clear, and create again. Parents are pretty tickled to have content kiddos in the back seat. Good price point, would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Instead of stealing my white board, now my 4 year old uses this writing tablet to practice writing and its so easy and fun to use!! Very satisfied with my purchase. Thank you:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This drawing board is very cool! It is lightweight, comes in different characters and colors and is very easy to use. Bought it for my 2-1/2 year old grandson and he loves it. It draws in color and the pen attaches easily to the side. It is portable, good for the car and fun to use. Bought another one for another child. Press the button at the top and it magically erases the board so you can draw a new picture!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The whole family loves it!
reviews.reviewText: This keeps my toddler busy longer than using traditional markers/crayons and paper. I love that it's mess free, lightweight and super portable. My husband and I find ourselves drawing on this often because it's so cool! The only qualm I have is that the elastic cord that attaches to the drawing pen isn't very strong and I feel like it's going to snap everytime it's used. But overall it's a great item and I would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my four year old daughter and she absolutely loves it! It is simple enough for her to be able to erase the board and start fresh whenever she wants. It's lightweight and durable making it very ideal for her age group.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: I am super happy with device for my 2 year old son. It is a no mess way for him to draw, be silly, and experience colors. It is light weight and easy to take on the go for entertainment. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They love it
reviews.reviewText: Great alternative reams of paper for young imaginations. Easy to use and durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for young ones
reviews.reviewText: Simple and fun to use. My 3 year old granddaughter feels like she has her own “tablet.”
